title: The Bachelor Peter Weber has a bandaged forehead as he is pictured after 'freak accident'
text:
He suffered a facial injury that required him to get 22 stitches while filming The Bachelor.

Now Peter Weber has been pictured for the first time since the incident.

The reality star, 28, was seen with a bandaged forehead as he posed for a photo with a fan in Lima, Peru.

Update: Peter Weber was seen with a bandaged forehead as he posed for a photo with a fan in Lima, Peru

Fan Sabryna Salazar took the photo with the star in Parque Kennedy En Miraflores, where the pilot looked in good spirits while enjoying a cup of coffee.

It looks like Peter is definitely recovering from the incident that rattled Bachelor Nation earlier this month.

Peter was reportedly walking on a golf course in Costa Rica with two cocktail glasses in his hand when he suffered a serious facial injury, according to Radar Online.

'He went to step on the cart but fell and split his face open on two cocktail glasses he was carrying,' a source told Radar. 'He is pulling through.'

Scare: Peter was reportedly walking on a golf course in Costa Rica with two cocktail glasses in his hand when he suffered a serious facial injury, according to Radar Online (pictured September 2019 in Burbank)

He was reportedly driven to a hospital two hours away in order to have surgery performed by a doctor who specialized in his particular injury.

Peter ultimately received 22 stitches, which have since been removed, according to People.

Shortly after news of the injury broke, host Chris Harrison assured everyone Peter was doing just fine.

Pilot Peter! Weber is a real-life pilot looking for love on The Bachelor

Doing A-OK: Host Chris Harrison gave fans an update on social media shortly after the news broke

'There's been some wild claims and rumors about Peter today,' he wrote on his Instagram account. 'Peter suffered a freak accident. He got a cut on his head, he did get stitches but he's 100% OK and production is already back underway. He's still the dashing, handsome pilot we've all dreamed of.'

Peter was selected to be the next Bachelor after competing for Hannah Brown's heart on her season of The Bachelorette.

The Westlake-based star learned he would be the new Bachelor just before he was scheduled to fly a red eye.

'I had to fly a red eye that night from Burbank to Atlanta for my job,' he said on The Ellen DeGeneres Show. 'And I was like, "I got to bring this down again, I got to focus." But I was wired for that entire flight. It was crazy!'

Peter will go down in Bachelor Nation history after Hannah revealed they had sex four times during their Fantasy Suite night in Greece.
description: The reality star, 28, posed for a photo with a fan in Lima, Peru, where he sported a bandage over his forehead. Fan Sabryna Salazar took the photo with the star in Parque Kennedy En Miraflores.
